trans-unit.source: References one or more methods to be called when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento a uno o più metodi da chiamare quando la disponibilità di rete cambia.

trans-unit.source: This delegate handles <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> events raised by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo delegato gestisce <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>gli eventi generati dalla <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>classe.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on receiving notification for network interface address change events, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class overview documentation.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su come ricevere notifiche per l'indirizzo dell'interfaccia di rete degli eventi di modifica, vedere il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>Panoramica documentazione per la classe.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> event is supported on Windows 2000 and later.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>l'evento è supportato in Windows 2000 e versioni successive.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>
